ORG_0000073 - organizatonal head role

Label

organizatonal head role

Sub class of

BFO_0000023 - role

Definition

The role of a person to be the head of an organization

Definition source

Michael Conlon https://orcid.org/0000-0002-1304-8447

Example

Joey Wat is the head of Yum China

Term editor

Michael Conlon https://orcid.org/0000-0002-1304-8447
